item.title: Git Remote Repository
item.description: Setup Git Repository How to install git on your system: https://git-scm.com/downloads, Documentation You can store your repositories: github.com, gitlab.com, bitbucket.org and etc. Create a new repository on the command line: echo “# Git Repository” >> README.md git init git add README.md git commit -m “first commit git branch -M master git remote add origin git@github.com:your-repo/your-repo-name.git git push -u origin master Push an existing repository from the command line:
